title: Argentina's YPF posts 2017 profit of $627 mln vs 2016 loss
text:
BUENOS AIRES, March 2 (Reuters) - Argentinaâ€™s state-owned oil company YPF SA posted a full-year 2017 profit of 12.7 billion pesos ($627.16 million), the company said on Friday, compared with a loss of 28.4 billion pesos in 2016.
In the fourth quarter of 2017, the company posted a 12 billion-peso profit, compared with a 1.8 billion peso-profit in the same period the prior year and a 246 million peso-profit in the third quarter. ($1 = 20.2500 Argentine pesos) (Reporting by Luc Cohen)
